name: Bratwurst
description:
This pork sausage is America's favorite German wurst
Brioche bun with sauerkraut and Haus dijonnaise which is mayo, mustard and vinegar.

name: Spicy Bauernwurst
description:
pork and beef sausage w/ a light and pleasant heat
Served on a brioche bun w/ sauerkraut and haus-made “dijonnaise” which is mayo, mustard and vinegar.

name: Kasekrainer
description:
beef & pork sausage, studded with cheddar cheese
Served on a brioche bun w/ sauerkraut and haus-made “dijonnaise” which is mayo, mustard and vinegar.

name: Frankfurter
description:
the best beef hot dog you've ever had
Served on a brioche bun w/ sauerkraut and haus-made “dijonnaise” which is mayo, mustard and vinegar.

name: Veggie Bratwurst
description:
"Beyond" bratwurst
vegan & plant based sausage
Can be served on pita (vegan) or pretzel hot dog bun (not vegan)
